PA_MIXED_MODE.Message: Primitive array mixes literal values and named references
PA_MIXED_MODE.Remediation: Make all elements either literals or named references; move mixed entries to separate arrays

PA_LITERAL_PARSE_FAILED.Message: Literal value failed to parse consistently as a primitive
PA_LITERAL_PARSE_FAILED.Remediation: Ensure literals are homogeneous and parseable (ints, floats, booleans, or strings)

PA_EXPECTED_KIND_MISMATCH.Message: Literal value does not match the expected primitive kind
PA_EXPECTED_KIND_MISMATCH.Remediation: Convert literals to the expected type or update the schema to accept the actual kind; consider allowCoercion when appropriate
